skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Fierce beasts that will fight to the death any who enter their territory – be they man or Dragon!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
This man is a paragon of Bretonnia. It is a privilege to serve at his side.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -8% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The impossibly dense iron of Henri’s custom-built chainmail would undoubtedly weigh down lesser – and smaller – men than he.
Henri le Massif’s unique virtues make him almost indomitable in the face of the largest and most fearsome abominations.
Men of great size and stature have an easier time inspiring others, the mere sight of them instilling courage in their brethren.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Bretonnia is renowned for its unstoppable cavalry. They have spent centuries perfecting the feeding regime of their mounts.
Reserve your loathing for the evil and the monstrous, and hate them with all of your fury.
This one is an appalling force of death on the battlefield. He stampedes ahead at the slightest provocation, completely oblivious to those under his command.
If you are not capable of killing them yourself then I bid that you stand aside so that I may, whelp!
This one, whether he knows it or not, has the favour of the Lady. She will aid him whenever he is in dire peril.
You need only a fleeting glimpse of the light emanating from this knight to know that he has been chosen by the Lady.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: When you defend your homeland side-by-side with a living legend you become a part of his story.
We shall not allow their unholy taint to mar the beauty of our lands any longer! Ride them down!

effects.description: Melee defence: +3 when fighting against Undead
Melee defence: +7 when fighting against Undead
Melee defence: +15 when fighting against Undead

skillTree.localised_description: This Paladin's virtuous radiance inspires his troops to leap into the fray.
Ensuring his men stay engaged takes some of the weight away from this Paladin's sword arm.
The truly chivalrous are charitable too.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -3% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -6% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -10% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hailing from northern Bretonnia, Henri is as much mountain as man, and an expert when fighting large opponents, especially the most dangerous, horrifying beasts imaginable!

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
